Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Curatrice e fondatrice della rivista Writing Systems Research. Con Vivan Cook (University of Newcastle) e Jyotsna Vaid (Texas A&M). www.tandfonline.com/action/journalInformation?show=editorialBoard &journalCode=pwsr20 (precedentemente Oxford University Press)
Membro del comitato editoriale, International Journal of Bilingual Education and Bilingualism.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Bassetti, B., Mairano, P., Masterson, J., & Cerni, T. (2017, June) Effects of orthography on bilinguals’ second language phonology: Number of letters and sound duration in speech production and awareness. International Symposium on Bilingualism (ISB 11), Limerick, Ireland.

Trenkic, D., Bassetti, B. and Clarke, A. (2013, August), ‘Calendar processing in Chinese learners of English as a second language’, European Second Language Association conference (EuroSLA 23),, Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
Bassetti, B. (2014, May) ‘Effects of orthographic forms on second language phonology.’ Second New Sounds in the North East workshop, Newcastle.

Bassetti, B., Mairano, P., Cerni, T., & Masterson, J. (2016, April) Number of consonant and vowel letters affects the perception of homophonic word pairs in L2 English. Paper presented at the Sound to Word in Bilingual and Second Language Speech Perception conference, Iowa City, USA.
Bassetti, B. (2012, October) ‘Il bilinguismo apre la mente’. Apprendimento plurilingue per percorsi didattici senza frontiere tra Italia, Austria e Slovenia, Udine, Italy.
Bassetti, B. (2012, July) ‘Counterfactual reasoning in Chinese speakers’. International Conference on Thinking 2012, London.
Bassetti, B. and Kaimaki, M. (2012, July) ‘Effects of orthographic representations on pronunciation in learners of English as a Foreign Language’. Second Language Acquisition of Phonology 2012, York.
Bassetti, B. (2009) ‘Perception of animals’ femininity in bilinguals and monolinguals: Effects of grammatical gender’, the 7th International Symposium on Bilingualism, Utrecht, 8-11 July.
Bassetti, B. (2014, April) 'Orthographic effects on second language phonology'. Experimental Psychology Society meeting, University of Kent.

Bassetti, B., Sokolović-Perović, M., Mairano, P., & Cerni, T. (2017, September) Orthography-induced length contrasts in the L2 phonological systems of Italian speakers of English. European Second Language Association conference (EuroSLA 27), Reading, UK.

Bassetti, B. (2008) ‘Orthographic input and the acquisition of phonology in second language learners of Chinese’. Workshop on the Relation between Orthography and Phonological Acquisition, Ghent, 14 November.
Bassetti, B. (2008) ‘Effects of orthographic representations on pronunciation in second language learners of Chinese’, Workshop on Writing Systems: Analysis, Acquisition and Use, London, 22 November.

Bassetti, B. (2016, November). Effects of orthography on phonology in second language speakers. Invited keynote lecture at the ‘Multiliteracies in/and education’ workshop organised by the LitCo (Literacy in Language Contact) network, Luxemburg.

Bassetti, B., Escudero, P. and Hayes-Harb, R. (2013, August), ‘Second language phonology at the interface between acoustic and orthographic input’, European Second Language Association conference (EuroSLA 23), Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
Bassetti, B., Cerni, T., Mairano, P., & Masterson, J. (2016, July) Effects of orthography on the perception of second language spoken words. Experimental Psychology Society meeting, Oxford.

Bassetti, B. (2010) ‘The concept of word in a morphemic writing system with no interword spacing: Word awareness in native and non-native users of Chinese’. Workshop on ‘What makes a word a word? The concept of word in different writing systems’. Aachen, 22-23 July.
Bassetti, B. (2008) ‘Counterfactual reasoning in Chinese-English bilinguals’. International Conference on Language, Communication and Cognition, Brighton, 4-7 August.

Bassetti, B., Mairano, P., Sokolović-Perović, M., & Cerni, T. (2016, June) The phonological status of gemination in Italian speakers of L2 English. New Sounds 2016, 8th International Conference on Second-Language Speech, Aarhus, Denmark.

Bassetti, B. (2016, April) An orthography-induced phonological contrast in Italian speakers of English as a Second Language. Invited panel session presented at the Sound to Word in Bilingual and Second Language Speech Perception conference, Iowa City, USA.

Bassetti, B. (2014) ‘L2 orthographic forms and L1 grapheme-phoneme correspondences result in a phonological contrast that is unattested in the target language’. European Second Language Association conference, York, 3-6 September 2014.
Bassetti, B. and Comfort, T. (2013, July), ‘Culture and language learning’, Linking Research and Practice in Education conference, York.
Bassetti, B., Cerni, T., Mairano, P., & Masterson, J. (2016, July) Effects of orthography on the perception of second language spoken words. Experimental Psychology Society meeting, Oxford.

Bassetti, B. and Atkinson, N. (2013, August), ‘Effects of orthographic forms on pronunciation in experienced instructed second language learners’, European Second Language Association conference (EuroSLA 23), Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Fellow of the Higher Education Academy
Premio "Supervisor of the Year" (relatore dell'anno) York University Students Union
British Psychological Society, Chartered Psychologist (CPsychol) and Associate Fellow (AFBPsS) https://www.bps.org.uk/lists/cpsychol/view/psychologist/196501
Chartered Institute of Linguists, Chartered Linguist (CL) and Fellow (FCIL, 2017-) https://www.ciol.org.uk/member-check/profile/49964/11668

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Principal Investigator del progetto "Understanding the prayer of others: A first exploration of sacred language use and bilingual prayer in Islam". Co-investigator: Prof Jean-Marc Dewaele (Birkbeck, University of London). Sponsor: Spalding Trust. http://www.spaldingtrust.org.uk/

Partner del network internazionale Words in the World, sponsorizzato da un Partnership Grant del Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council canadese. http://wordsintheworld.ca/people/researchers/

Visiting Research Associate Institute of Education, University of London
Lecturer (=Assistant Professor) University of York (Regno Unito)
